overview: Derrick Byrd a former US Air Force mortician, always wanted to keep the peace. After his older brother & girlfriend was murdered by crooked cop. Derrick decided to become a cop to bring forth change in the community. But finds himself in a predicament that leads to his suspension pending investigation of a stop & frisk which suspects dies. Derrick starts to break down as he conflicted over a spiritual warfare between life & death. Going into a deep depression of PTSD Derrick struggles to pull himself together to be there for his mother who is suffering in the hospital during the pandemic and his own people who wants him behind bars. Derrick is left alone to fight his own spirit & flesh in UnWelcomed Justice.
title: UnWelcomed Justice
